snippet: Jonathan Kodija converted a late penalty to earn Aston Villa a 1-1 draw with Leeds United on Thursday, maintaining his team's unbeaten home record in the Championship this season....
lead_paragraph: Jonathan Kodija converted a late penalty to earn Aston Villa a 1-1 draw with Leeds United on Thursday, maintaining his team's unbeaten home record in the Championship this season.

headline.main: Leeds Thwarted by Late Kodija Penalty for Villa
headline.print_headline: Leeds Thwarted by Late Kodija Penalty for Villa
